reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Naatange art la Youth Create Prosperity

description.narrative: The project supports Senegalese young peoples possibilities to decent employment in the creative sector civic participation and quality education which will advance sustainable social development of the Senegalese society. The project offers training for 5 00 disadvantaged youth who are out of school and formal employment but engaged in artistic activities in the informal sector. The youth will reinforce their professional and entrepreneurial capacities in the cultural field and they will be supported to fin d employment or start their own business after the training. The project activities are run by five partner organizations who are experts in different areas of art. The partners will provide the technical trainings in their fields of expertise. In addition to the specialized technical trainings the young artists will participate together in life skills and entrepreneurship training as well as civic education and they will be capacitated to use art for social change.The project partners will benefit from the cooperation as they share their expertise with each other. A curriculum will be developed in the beginning of project and its formalization as certified vocational training by the Ministry of Vocational Training will be pursued with the help of UNESCO. Th is will support the effectiveness and sustainability of their work and enhance the young artists possibilities in working as serious and revered professionals.Another component of the project is school program aiming to enhance the quality of education and pedagogy. The program will be organized in 40 schools. 120 teachers and principals and 800 school students participate in the program. The teachers and principals receive training in civic education life skills and youth participation and will conduct the program with their students at schools which culminates in a community project and event at the school area. The young artists will be connected to the school program by internship which they are going to conduct in the schools as a part of their training . This gives them valuable practical experience in applying art for social projects and finding new markets for business.
